name: Monochoroma
description:
This is a game created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam, based on the concept of a sidescroller without scrolling. I intend to add more levels, but for now I hope you enjoy.

Downloading Steps:

The button below will download the game in a .zip format. You must extract the files to a folder before executing the executable titled "GMTK ". Hope it works!

Controls:

A and D/Arrow Keys - Movement

W/Up arrow - Jump

Esc - Exit to menu
